title: Be Kind Rewind

This is going to be amazing if for no other reason than it's being directed by Michel Gondry.[center]TOUGH GUYS DON'T FOLLOW FADS[/center]

title: Re: Be Kind Rewind
content:
I have to say I didn't get very interested in this. I checked a trailer at youtube. So they make something movies again or something? Well, perhaps it's more fun when one sees it whole, but I'm not sure I will -- I've only seen one movie by this director, Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind, and I absolutely hated it.3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: Be Kind Rewind
content: I thought Eternal Sunshine was fantastic :\ I felt that the creative directorial approach was some of the most brilliant I had ever seen.[center]<font color="MAROON">TOUGH GUYS DON'T FOLLOW FADS</font>[/center]

title: Eternal Sunshine
content:
You either love or hate Eternal Sunshine. I thought it was excellent, but that's just me. I wasn't a fan of The Science of Sleep, though.

And speaking of Gondry... did you hear he's doing a movie on the life of Debbie Harry? Weird.
